Section.Catchline: Termination of tenancy without specific term.

SectionBody.Text: A tenancy without a specific duration, as defined in s. 83.46(2) or (3), may be terminated by either party giving written notice in the manner provided in s. 83.56(4), as follows:

Subsection.Text: When the tenancy is from year to year, by giving not less than 60 days’ notice prior to the end of any annual period;
When the tenancy is from quarter to quarter, by giving not less than 30 days’ notice prior to the end of any quarterly period;
When the tenancy is from month to month, by giving not less than 15 days’ notice prior to the end of any monthly period; and
When the tenancy is from week to week, by giving not less than 7 days’ notice prior to the end of any weekly period.
